author: eptwts
text:
creativity is a balance of inputs/outputs

i don't know a single creative person who doesn't consume a shitton of content - whether that's books, videos, tweets, podcasts, etc.

if you grew up in a empty room w/ just a book & a pen, with zero access to any "inputs", you'd have absolutely nothing to write about

the greatest habit you can adopt to 100x your creativity is to frequently cycle between consumption & creation
